wikipedia_page.main: Mary Ann Ashford (1787–1870) was an English cook. She published her memoirs, an account of her life as a domestic servant, Life of a Licensed Victualler's Daughter, which was published in 1844.

response: *Mary Ann Ashford (1787–1870), cook and author of Life of a Licensed Victualler's Daughter
*Mary Ann Ashford (1787–1870), English cook, married Edward Green
